title: Clash of Teams final announcement! - This is a must watch!
description:
A couple rule changes, so please pay attention!  And enjoy :D


How to send me replays(video is very loud :P)!:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f0hqo420MO8


rules!  

Here is all of the rules and details!

This is a  best out of 3, 2v2 Tournament!

Sign Up:

To sign up, leave your name and teammates name in comments, and a team name!  Also what region you are from (N.A or EU) 
___________________________________________________ 

Ban Rules:

Each team will have 1 ban. 
And there will be multiple maps we are playing on.
_____________________________________________________

Money and build Rules:

Money: 12500 per player, 25000 per Team!

Rules: 6/2 cav,  No art,  max 2 guns(No musketeers of any kind & no camel gunners)

Venice Rule: Max 2 Strads, once you use Venice you can no longer play them again in the tournament.

naffatun Rules:  It your army has the ability to get naffatuns, you can only get 4.

Mongols Rule: 7/3 cav!

Timurid Rule: 7/3 cav!  You can get 1 ele, but only 4 cav. 
_____________________________________________________

Date:

The tournament will be held on Saturday July 12!  This is not set in stone! time(To be announced)


if you have any question, ask away in the comments!
